src_original: samāsato bodhisattvasya gṛhipakṣagataṃ pravrajitapakṣagatañca śīlaṃ sarvaśīlamityucyate /  tatpunargṛhipakṣāśritaṃ pravrajitapakṣāśritañca śīlaṃ samāsatastrividham /  saṃvaraśīlaṃ kuśaladharmasaṃgrāhakaśīlaṃ sattvārthakriyāśīlañca /
tgt_original: 略有三種，謂律儀戒、攝善法戒、攝眾生戒。

src_original: tatra saṃvaraśīlaṃ bodhisattvasya katamat /  yatsaptanairṇāyikaṃ prātimokṣasaṃvarasamādānaṃ bhikṣubhikṣuṇī-śikṣamāṇā-śrāmaṇera-śramaṇeryyupāsakopāsikāśīlam /
tgt_original: 彼所謂戒律儀戒者，菩薩正取七眾律儀，所謂比丘、比丘尼、式叉摩那、沙彌、沙彌尼、優婆塞、優婆夷戒。

src_original: tadetad gṛhipravrajitapakṣe yathāyogaṃ veditavyam /
tgt_original: 出家、在家，如是次第皆律儀攝。

src_original: tatra kuśaladharmasaṃgrāhakaṃ śīlaṃ yatkiñcidbodhisattvaḥ śīlasaṃvarasamādānādūrdhvaṃ
tgt_original: 何者菩薩攝善法戒？ 菩薩所有善法及戒皆正聚已，然後修集大菩提善。

src_original: mahābodhāya kuśalamācinoti kāyena vācā manasā sarvaṃ tatsamāsataḥ kuśaladharmasaṃgrāhakaṃ śīlamityucyate /
tgt_original: 若身、若口、若意等善，如是略說攝善法戒。

src_original: iha bodhisattvaḥ śīlaṃ niśritya śīlaṃ pratiṣṭhāya śrute yogaṃ karoti cintāyāṃ śamathavipaśyanābhāvanāyāmekārāmatāyām /
tgt_original: 依戒住戒，然後修聞，次修思惟，後奢摩他毘婆舍那專一樂行。

src_original: tathā gurūṇāmabhivādana-vandana pratyutthānāñjalikarmaṇaḥ kālena kālaṃ kartā bhavati /
tgt_original: 如尊長前正面言語，先禮拜已後起合掌，時時常爾。

src_original: tathā kālena kālaṃ teṣāmeva gurūṇāṃ gauraveṇopasthānasya kartā bhavati /  glānānāṃ satkṛtya kāruṇyena glānopasthānasya kartā bhavati tathā subhāṣite sādhukārasya dātā bhavati /  guṇavatāṃ pudgalānāṃ bhūtasya varṇasyāhartā bhavati /  tathā sarvasattvānāṃ daśasu dikṣu sarvapuṇyasyāśayena prasannacittamutpādya vācaṃ bhāṣāmāṇo 'numoditā bhavati /
tgt_original: 如是時時如是尊長敬重供給，常於病者悲心供給，若聞善語讚言善哉，於功德人說實功德，生如是心普為十方。 如彼十方一切眾生一切福德勤心隨喜，喜心生已然後口說。

src_original: tathā sarvaṃ vyatikramaṃ pratisaṃkhyāya pareṣāṃ kṣamitā bhavati /
tgt_original: 於他一切犯觸己者皆能忍受。

src_original: tathā sarvaṃ kāyena vācā manasā kṛtaṃ kuśalamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayitā bhavati /
tgt_original: 一切所修身口意善，皆悉願取阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。

src_original: kālena ca kālaṃ vicitrāṇāṃ samyak praṇidhānānāṃ triratnapūjāyāśca sarvākārāyā udārāyāḥ kartā (Dutt 97) bhavati /  abhiyuktaśca bhavatyārabdhavīryaḥ satatasamitaṃ kuśalapakṣe /  apramādavihārī kāyena vācā /  śikṣāpadānāṃ smṛtisaṃprajanyacārikayā cārakṣakaḥ /
tgt_original: 時時種種供養三寶，一切種種設供養已，口發正願，相應精進常護善分，身不放逸、口誦學句、意念發行，藏護根門食惟知足，初夜後夜覺寤相應。

src_original: indriyaiśca guptadvāro bhojane mātrajñaḥ pūrvarātrāpararātraṃ jāgarikānuyuktaḥ satpuruṣasevī kalyāṇamitrasanniśritaḥ ātmaskhalitānāñca parijñātā bhavati doṣadarśī /  parijñāya ca doṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā pratisaṃhartā bhavati /
tgt_original: 親近善人依善知識，自識己錯，犯過識知，見已知改。

src_original: skhalitaśca buddhabodhisattvānāṃ sahadhārmikāṇāṃ cāntike 'tyayadeśako bhavati /
tgt_original: 犯佛菩薩諸福德人，盡心懺悔。

src_original: evaṃbhāgīyānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmarjanarakṣaṇavivardhanāya yacchīlaṃ [tad] bodhisattvasya kuśaladharmasaṃgrāhakaṃ śīlamityucyate /
tgt_original: 如是等分攝取善法，得善法已守護增長。 若如是戒，是名菩薩攝善法戒。

src_original: tatra katamad bodhisattvasya sattvānugrāhakaṃ śīlam /
tgt_original: 何者菩薩攝眾生戒？

src_original: tatsamāsata ekādaśākāraṃ veditavyam /
tgt_original: 彼要略說有十一種，此義應知。

src_original: ekādaśākārāḥ katame /
tgt_original: 何等十一？

src_original: sattvakṛtyeṣvarthopasaṃhiteṣu [vicitreṣu] sahāyībhāvaḥ /
tgt_original: 一者種種饒益眾生，種種因緣同事相應。

src_original: sattvānāmutpannotpanneṣu vyādhyādiduḥkheṣu glānopasthānādikaḥ sahāyībhāvaḥ /
tgt_original: 二者眾生病不病等，種種諸苦供給伴等。

src_original: tathā laukikalokottareṣvartheṣu dharmadeśanāpūrvaka upāyopadeśapūrvakaśca nyāyopadeśaḥ /
tgt_original: 三者世間出世間義，如彼法說，先示方便先示道理。

src_original: upakāriṣu ca sattveṣu kṛtajñatāmanurakṣato 'nurūpa[pratyupakāra-]pratyupasthānam /  vivighebhyaśca siṃhavyāghrarājacaurodakāgnyādikebhyo vicitrebhyo bhayasthānebhyaḥ sattvānāmārakṣā /  bhogajñātivyasaneṣu śokavinodanā /
tgt_original: 四者報眾生恩，不忘恩報，隨所宜護隨報供給。 五者師子虎王水火賊等，種種畏處護諸眾生。 六者諸親善友亡失富樂、憂悲殃罪，能為除遣。

src_original: upakaraṇavighātiṣu sattveṣu sarvopakaraṇopasaṃhāraḥ /  nyāyapatitaḥ samyaṅniśrayadānato dharmeṇa gaṇaparikarṣaṇā /
tgt_original: 七者貧窮苦惱乞匃眾生，一切所須皆悉給與，行善之人依正捨法功德攝取。

src_original: ālapanasaṃlapanapratisammodanaiḥ kālenopasaṃkramaṇatayā parato bhojanapānādi [prati]grahato
tgt_original: 八者先語問訊，後語問訊應時而往。 九者若他呼喚取食飲等，世間饒益彼此往來。

src_original: laukikārthānuvyavahārataḥ āhūtasyāgamanagamanataḥ samāsataḥ sarvānarthopasaṃhitāmanāpasamudācāraparivarjanaiścittānuvartanatā /
tgt_original: 以要言之，一切所有不饒益事、不可愛行，皆悉捨離，心隨順轉。

src_original: bhūtaiśca guṇaiḥ saṃpraharṣaṇatā /
tgt_original: 十者自實功德心生歡喜，公白正取畢竟唱說以潤益心。

src_original: snigdhena hitādhyāśayānugatenāntargatamānasena nigrahakriyā avasādanā vā daṇḍakarmānupradānaṃ va pravāsanā vā yāvadevākuśalāsthānāt vyutthāpya kuśale sthāne sanniyojanārtham /
tgt_original: 若治若擯、若罰若黜、或時驅遣，諸如是等不善處擯，令住善處相應饒益。
